entry.title: LIVESTREAM: TV Patrol | July 16, 2020 Full Episode

media:group.media:title: LIVESTREAM: TV Patrol | July 16, 2020 Full Episode
media:group.media:description:
Tutukan ang mga nagbabagang balitang nakalap ng buong puwersa ng ABS-CBN News sa nakalipas na 24 oras.
TV Patrol is the flagship newscast of ABS-CBN. Catch the latest news and analysis today and every day brought to you by ABS-CBN News in the service of the Filipino.
Get access to TV Patrol on TFC Online if you’re watching overseas. Visit us here https://bit.ly/37yGXFn
Subscribe to ABS-CBN News’ YouTube channel for breaking news and updates on COVID-19 and the enhanced community quarantine being observed in select parts of the Philippines to stop the spread of the disease. Don't forget to click the bell button to catch the latest videos from us.
Stay updated by visiting https://news.abs-cbn.com/
For more TV Patrol video highlights, click the link below: http://bit.ly/TVPatrol_2020

entry.title: 'Di pa nakakabawi': Ilang tindera, tsuper dumadaing sa 2-linggong Navotas lockdown

media:group.media:title: 'Di pa nakakabawi': Ilang tindera, tsuper dumadaing sa 2-linggong Navotas lockdown
media:group.media:description: MAYNILA - Umarangkada na ang dalawang linggong lockdown sa Navotas City ngayong Biyernes, na sinimulan matapos ang patuloy na tumataas na bilang ng kaso ng coronavirus sa lungsod.

entry.title: ‘Mas delikado’ ang COVID-19 syndrome para sa mga ‘obese’ o sobrang taba

media:group.media:title: ‘Mas delikado’ ang COVID-19 syndrome para sa mga ‘obese’ o sobrang taba
media:group.media:description: MAYNILA - Maaaring mas malala ang sintomas ng coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) para sa mga may obesity, o labis na katabaan, ayon sa isang doktor.

entry.title: Dayaw Season 8 Episode 5: In Their Own Words

media:group.media:title: Dayaw Season 8 Episode 5: In Their Own Words
media:group.media:description:
Subscribe to the ABS-CBN News channel! - http://bit.ly/TheABSCBNNews Dayaw Season 8 Episode 5: In Their Own Words (Heritage Advocates of Taal and Sariaya and their Treasures)
In this episode, we see the heritage treasures of Taal in Batangas and Sariaya in Quezon as seen through the eyes of those who love them most, and know them most intimately --- teachers, tourist guides, priests and private individuals who speak with undeniable love and pride.

entry.title: Pulis 'back-up lang' sa house-to-house COVID-19 search - PNP official

media:group.media:title: Pulis 'back-up lang' sa house-to-house COVID-19 search - PNP official
media:group.media:description: MAYNILA – Nagbigay-linaw si Lt. Gen. Guillermo Eleazar ngayong Huwebes hinggil sa usapin ng house-to-house search para sa mild at asymptomatic coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) patients.

entry.title: Mga paaralan tatanggap ng late enrollees hanggang Setyembre: DepEd | Teleradyo

media:group.media:title: Mga paaralan tatanggap ng late enrollees hanggang Setyembre: DepEd | Teleradyo
media:group.media:description:
Hindi na kailangang pang i-extend ang enrollment period para sa darating na pasukan dahil tatanggap pa rin ng late enrollees ang mga paaralan hanggang buwan ng Setyembre, ayon sa isang opsiyal ng Department of Education (DepEd).

entry.title: MOR, tuluyan nang magsasara; DJ Chacha, naiyak | Teleradyo

media:group.media:title: MOR, tuluyan nang magsasara; DJ Chacha, naiyak | Teleradyo
media:group.media:description:
Hindi napigil ni DJ Chacha o Czarina Balba sa totoong buhay ang umiyak nang ibahagi niyang tigil operasyon na ang FM radio station na MOR 101.9 sa Metro Manila. Aniya, isang pagpupulong ang nangyari kagabi kasama ang kanyang pamilya sa MOR 101.9 kung saan inanunsiyo na sa kanila ang masakit na balitang na hanggang sa susunod na buwan na lang ang FM radio station ng ABS-CBN sa Metro Manila.
